thread.section_title: Hotel Traiano - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Hotel Traiano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: John B
title: Great location
text:
Hotel Traiano is a lovely and clean hotel and the location is perfect,
500 metres to the Trevi Fountain, and 300 metres to the Colonna Tralana, 10 min walk to the Colossum, and a 30 min walk to the Vatican City.
Back to the Hotel it has a lift and the Breakfast is plentyful,
All the staff are very friendly you could not ask for more.
Good choice and 25 mins from the airport.
Would book again or reccomend to any of my friends.
